body.p:
Georgetown Ky May 23d/62
To his Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky

The undersigned citizens of Scott county would respectfully represent to your favorable notice the petitioner H W Chiles -- and state that he has been fined Thirty dollars in these cases in the scott circuit court for liquor sold at his bar by a black man in his employ as waiter &c. to other blacks -- The cases stand on the Docket Nos 271-272 & 273 -- Also in the cases before the Town judge of Georgetown -- in the cases for the same offences -- the sum of fifty Dollars in each case, As Mr Chiles is a poor man -- and the costs from which he has no relief is a considerable buden to him we would
most respectfully petition your excellency to remit all of said fines that you can consistantly do --

J. C. Applegate
H C White
